skillTree.localised_description: "Da Big Boss getz da biggest barka', nuff sed."

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

skillTree.localised_description: A quick Snotling sacrifice to da Spider-god gets the boss a fearsome mount.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

skillTree.localised_description: This Boss is especially sneaky, able to deploy deep in enemy gits' terrain before battle.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: Like all nasty skulkers, dis Boss is "a bad piece o' work" – when he stabs he really means it.
"I spy with my beady eye… something that needs to be killed."
You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Easy to use, fun to replace.
I'll cut ya, I'll bleed ya!
Nuffin' gets past stunty armor like stunty metal.
Yeah, I wouldn't get too near him if I was you.
Sometimes he stabs a gobbo or two by 'mistake', but he sure don't get tired.

effects.description:
Armour-Piercing Melee Damage: +1 for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Maybe inspirational... maybe just annoying.
Da Boss says make 'em bleed.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1 for Infantry units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +2 for Infantry units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Infantry units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Yeah it smells bad, but so do you lot! Now douse yourselves, we gots a scrap ta win.

effects.description:
Melee attack: -1 for War Beast, Monstrous Infantry and Giant units
	(enemy armies in region)

Melee attack: -2 for War Beast, Monstrous Infantry and Giant units
	(enemy armies in region)

Melee attack: -3 for War Beast, Monstrous Infantry and Giant units
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Pooin' upwind is funny. Pooin' upstream is downright nasty.

effects.description:
Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -1%
	(enemy armies in province)

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -2%
	(enemy armies in province)

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -4%
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Look lads, it ain't gonna be easy. A lotta yoos gonna die. But that's a sacrifice I'm willin' to make.

effects.description:
Armour-Piercing Melee Damage: +1 for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.
Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.
Always watching.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(own characters in region)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 4
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 6

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(all units in army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.
"Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Goblin and Night Goblin units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

effects.description:
Leadership: -5 for enemy Lords and embedded Heroes
	(enemy armies in region)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(own armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: You fink because I'm little I can't gut ya? I can! And I will! And I have! Now you're dead! ANYONE ELSE WANNA CALL ME SMALL?
You fink because I'm little I can't gut ya? I can! And I will! And I have! Now you're dead! ANYONE ELSE WANNA CALL ME SMALL?
